concept.title: Compression
concept.shortdesc: You can use Gzip, Bzip2, Snappy, and LZO compression with the Hadoop FS destination. To use LZO compression with the destination, you need to configure the to enable LZO compression.

conbody.p: Hadoop FS destinationcompressioncompressionfor the Hadoop FS destinationOther compression formats do not require additional configuration.

Due to JVM limitations, you can use LZO compression with only one version of Hadoop FS. If you installed multiple library versions, make sure to configure the to use compression with the version that you want to use.
